title: Science and Social Digital Literacy Enhancement Course Using the EXARIS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Strengthening Project Execution and Peer Feedback in Smartphone-Based Constrained Environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete an environmental crisis case analysis project by applying the five stages of the EXARIS model: inquiry, analysis, reflection, integration, and sharing.
Learners can logically explain at least three causes of environmental issues using scientific data visualization tools (smartphone apps).
Learners can exchange feedback with peers via a mobile-optimized digital collaboration platform and submit a final report.

resources: Integrated science and social studies digital content package
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
